upload.title: Upload Recording
upload.subtitle: Upload an audio file to transcribe with AI
upload.selectAudioFileDescription: Upload an audio recording for transcription. Supported formats: MP3, MP4, M4A, WAV, WebM, OGG, FLAC, AAC. Files larger than 25MB are automatically converted and split before upload.
upload.tapToSelect: Tap to select an audio file
upload.dragOrClick: Drag and drop your audio file here, or click to browse
upload.maximumFileSize: Files larger than {size} MB are automatically converted and split.
upload.fileReady: Your audio file is ready to upload.
upload.selectValidFile: Please select a valid audio file.
upload.pleaseSelectFile: Please select an audio file to upload.
upload.fileReadyToUpload: File validated and ready to upload
upload.languageHelp: Leave on "Auto-detect" to let AI determine the language
upload.modelHelp: Whisper v1 provides excellent accuracy for most use cases
upload.transcriptionProgressDescription: Processing your audio file. This may take a few minutes depending on the file size.
upload.uploadInfoFile: Select an audio file to get started. The transcription process typically takes 1-3 minutes depending on the file length.
upload.uploadInfoRecord: For Austin Fire Department: Tap "Start Recording" to capture radio traffic or field audio for training review. No external recording app needed.
upload.departmentHelp: This helps organize your recordings by department.

voiceRecorder.title: Voice Recording
voiceRecorder.tapToStart: Tap the microphone to start recording
voiceRecorder.tipFieldWorkers: Tip for field workers: Find a quiet location, speak clearly toward your device, and keep recording under 5 minutes for best results.
voiceRecorder.micAccessDenied: Microphone access denied. Please allow microphone access in your browser settings.
voiceRecorder.noMicFound: No microphone found. Please connect a microphone and try again.
voiceRecorder.recordingFailed: Failed to start recording. Please try again.
voiceRecorder.browserNotSupported: Your browser doesn't support audio recording. Please try using Chrome, Edge, or Safari.
voiceRecorder.recordingReadyDescription: Your voice recording is ready to transcribe.

transcripts.title: Transcripts
transcripts.subtitle: View and manage your transcribed recordings
transcripts.noTranscriptsDescription: Upload an audio recording to get started.
transcripts.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this transcript?
transcripts.confirmDeleteDescription: This action cannot be undone. The transcript and all associated data will be permanently deleted.
transcripts.transcriptDeletedDescription: The transcript has been permanently deleted.

templates.title: Templates
templates.subtitle: Pre-configured analysis templates for radio traffic review and training
templates.confirmDeleteTemplate: Are you sure you want to delete this template?

analysis.title: Analyze Transcript
analysis.selectTemplate: Select a template to analyze this transcript
analysis.alreadyAnalyzed: This transcript has already been analyzed with the selected template.
analysis.analysisCompleteDescription: Your transcript has been analyzed successfully.
analysis.speaker: Speaker

settings.title: Settings
settings.azureApiKeyPlaceholder: Enter your Azure OpenAI API key
settings.settingsSavedDescription: Your API configuration has been saved.
settings.configureAPI: Please configure your Azure OpenAI API credentials in Settings.

errors.generic: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
errors.networkError: Network error. Please check your connection and try again.
errors.unsupportedFormat: Unsupported file format. Please use MP3, MP4, M4A, WAV, WebM, OGG, FLAC, or AAC.
errors.serverError: Server error. Please try again later.

docs.title: Documentation & Help
docs.subtitle: Learn how to use Austin RTASS
docs.uploadTourDesc: Step-by-step guide to transcribing audio files
docs.recordTourDesc: Learn to record audio directly in the app
docs.analysisTourDesc: Generate training reviews from your transcripts
